title: Beef stifado
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter', '1 tablespoon olive oil, divided', '1kg (2 1/4 lb) beef stew meat, diced', '1 medium onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '100ml (4 fl oz) red wine', '1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1 strip fresh orange peel', '400g (7 oz) passata', '100ml (4 fl oz) water', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '500g (1 1/4 lb) pearl onions, peeled']
